Reviews.Title: Great during the day - not so great at night
Reviews.Author: Buddy
Reviews.Content: This camera works good during the daytime hours however at night we find it falling very short on the distance as advertised and everything is blurry at night. We are getting a new receiver for our cameras so this review may not be fair to the manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Carolyn E. Smith
Reviews.Content: it's not what we expected.  doesn't show up any better than cheaper ones.  would not recommend it to any one

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted and as discribed
Reviews.Author: GrayShadowDragon
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for one that got fried by a nearby lightning strike.  Works perfectly for looking down my long driveway.

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD
Reviews.Author: Jose Eugenio Garavito "GARAVITO"
Reviews.Content: I have it installed on my home, dont show more than 30 meters or 90 feet with good image. It only worked one day and stop working after a day. NOT GOOD.jose garavito

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: d1234
Reviews.Content: like any other cameras out there nothing special works great with all this led still need light to have colour at night i will say average product.

Reviews.Title: Rating the GW Security 540 Cameras
Reviews.Author: Dennis Dobson
Reviews.Content: Hi,  My wife and I use the GW Security 540 cameras on investigations of old buildings when long distance shots are needed. With these cameras, we have found that we have better IR coverage than with some of my other cameras. Very clear image and less trouble seeing the area where the cameras are placed. Have always had great shipping and on time deliveries. Sometimes even earlier than expected.Thank you,Dennis Dobson
